alert.note: Alert for Creek; Pawnee; Tulsa (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 06 at 1:50AM CDT until June 06 at 2:30AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Creek County in northeastern Oklahoma... Pawnee County in northeastern Oklahoma... Southwestern Tulsa County in northeastern Oklahoma... * Until 230 AM CDT. * At 150 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 2 miles north of Hallett to 3 miles south of Lake Carl Blackwell, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Tulsa... Sand Springs... Pawnee... Sapulpa... Jenks... Glenpool... Mannford... Drumright... Kellyville... Oilton... Jennings... Hallett... Terlton... Shamrock... Maramec... Keystone State Park... Jenks Riverside Airport... Silver City... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 196 and 216. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
